scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run clean && node scripts/copy-version-index.js && npm-run-all --parallel dev:*
scripts.dev:docs: NODE_ENV=development npm run clean:docs && npm run dev --workspace=docs
scripts.dev:website: NODE_ENV=development npm run clean:website && node scripts/copy-version-index.js && npm run dev --workspace=website
scripts.clean: npm run clean:docs && npm run clean:website
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production node scripts/copy-version-index.js && npm run clean && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.build:docs: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean:docs && npm run build --workspace=docs
scripts.build:website: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean:website && node scripts/copy-version-index.js && npm run build --workspace=website
